title: My Little Pony Equestria Girls Minis Sunset Shimmer
feature: Poseable doll with 9 points of articulation
Adorable mini size to take on the go
Comes with Sunset Shimmer signature skirt
description: This My Little Pony Equestria Girls Minis Sunset Shimmer mini doll is fun to pose! Pretend to express the personality of Sunset Shimmer with this cute mini-doll with her signature look and hairstyle. The Sunset Shimmer doll is poseable with 9 points of articulation and comes with a skirt. Get ready to imagine sharing friendship adventures with this adorable Sunset Shimmer doll. Also look for other My Little Pony Equestria Girls Minis dolls (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.) In the world of Canterlot High, more friends mean more friendship adventures! For more friendship fun, look for the Equestria Girls app! My Little Pony Equestria Girls and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
